## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G30350](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G30350)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>HIGLE</u>
- **Gene Name:** HYL1 INTERACTING GIY-YIG LIKE ENDONUCLEASE
- **Description:**   Excinuclease ABC, C subunit, N-terminal;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2065775
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
